pageTitle: Raviel, Lord of Phantasms - Yu-Gi-Oh! - It's time to Duel!
title: German
textBeforeTable: English—Worldwide TCG sets Divine-Beast DIVINE This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Tributing 3 monsters. When your opponent Summons a monster(s), Special Summon 1 "Phantasm Token" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) for each of those monsters. "Phantasm Tokens" cannot declare an attack. You can Tribute 2 monsters to have this card gain ATK equal to the combined ATK of the Tributed monsters, until the End Phase. English anime
